Entry.Definition: A collection or compilation of recorded information about patients in connection with healthcare, the Patient Record is the principal repository for information concerning a patient’s health care.

A Patient Record is a folder located in the Data folder within the representation and may contain any number of Cases, Sub-cases and Documents. The Patient Record is the principal repository for information concerning a patient’s health care.
A Case is a folder located in the Data folder within the representation and may contain any number of Sub-cases and Documents.
A Subcase is a folder located in a Case folder within the representation and must contain at least one Document.
Each Case or Subcase can contain individual Data Files that are related logically and together form Documents (e.g. a book, video, image and annotation, document and audio notes).
The folder in the representation containing the Patient Medical Records.
